name: meta-editor
description: ðŸŒŸ **WordPress Post Metadata Editor Plugin** ðŸŒŸ

scripts.tree: find . -type f ! -path '*/.*' ! -path '*/node_modules/*' ! -name 'README.md' ! -name 'package-lock.json' ! -name 'package.json' ! -name 'print.txt' -print0 | xargs -0 -I {} sh -c 'echo "path: {}"; echo "file contents:"; cat {}' > print.txt
